description: Machine-readable catalog of permissible and governed action categories used for runtime governance verification within the Sovereign Stack.

0_SAFE.description: Actions that pose no risk of kinetic, financial, security, or governance impact.

1_CONFIG.description: Actions involving internal configuration that do not influence external systems.

2_GOVERNANCE.description: Actions involving reasoning, evaluation, or analysis that affect internal governance posture but cannot directly impact external systems.

3_CRITICAL.description: Actions that require strict causal verification before execution. These include anything that could meaningfully influence system reasoning, cross-agent synchronization, or boundary conditions.

4_PROHIBITED.description: Actions that must never be executed due to kinetic, financial, or sovereignty risks.
